title: Verify Driver Identity with Selfie Check
description: To prevent account sharing, a driver is randomly prompted to take a selfie to verify it matches their profile picture before they can go online.

tasks.description: When a driver attempts to go online, the system randomly triggers an identity check.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver is prompted to take a selfie.

tasks.description: The driver takes a selfie using the app.
The system uses facial recognition to compare the selfie with the driver's stored profile photo.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates a match score.

tasks.description: The match score is high, the identity is verified, and the driver is allowed to go online.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver successfully passes the check and can start working.
